instance.context:
Orange and lemon are considered important as are such pastels as blue and lilac . In a brighter nautical vein is Ile_de_France blue . Contrast trim provides other touches of color . Spectators in white
crush textures dip toe and heel in smooth black , navy and taffy tan . Designed for summer comfort are the shoes illustrated . At the left is a pair of dressy straw pumps in a light , but crisp texture . In a lacy open weave shoes have a luster finish , braided collar and bow highlight on the squared throat .
